title: Pig Pen Improving Conditions for the Feeder Pigs

tasks.task: Mulching pig feeder area to improve accessibility
subtasks: Transporting mulch bags to the pig feeder area
Unloading mulch bags around the pig feeder
Distributing mulch to cover the muddy area
Assessing the improvement in pig mobility

tasks.task: Setup calving supplies and monitor cows.
Setup calving supplies for Desert Gold cows
subtasks: Unload supplies from pickup truck
Fill and position birth pool
Position hosing access
Deploy shading/tarpaulins
Continuously monitor the cows until calving

tasks.task: Prepare for calving of Desert Gold cows
subtasks: Approach the calving area on foot.
Check readiness of supplies (unloaded from the truck).
Fill and position the birth pool.
Position hoses/or water sources.
Set up tarp shelters.
Monitor the herd’s condition, observing for signs of impending calving.

tasks.task: Conduct regular calving monitoring for Desert Gold cows.

subtasks: Retrieve and organize necessary items (buckets, hose, tarp, etc.) from the truck.
Setup the birth pool, ensure water supply.
Position tarp for shade protection.
Walk around the herd, checking each cow’s condition.

tasks.task: Prepare calving area and monitor Desert Gold cows

subtasks: Retrieve and arrange supplies (buckets, hoses, tarp, etc.)
Position the birth pool with sufficient water.

tasks.task: Monitor calving progress and manage post-calving care
subtasks: Regularly check the herd (e.g., every hour) for signs of calving.

tasks.task: Setup calving area with necessary supplies
subtasks: Unload supplies from truck.
Stock water supply in the birth pool.
Position hoses for easy access.
Position shade/tarpaulin to protect calves.
